mapper.select: SELECT patient.id AS id, patient.name AS name, patient.gender AS gender, birthday, bed_id, department.name AS department, region.name AS region, opinion.content AS opinion, description.content AS description, patient_id, slice_id, slice_num, create_time, checkUser.name AS check_user, check_time, createUser.name AS create_user FROM patient INNER JOIN user AS checkUser ON patient.check_uid = checkUser.id INNER JOIN user AS createUser ON patient.create_uid = createUser.id INNER JOIN department ON patient.department_id = department.id INNER JOIN region ON patient.region_id = region.id INNER JOIN opinion ON patient.opinion_id = opinion.id INNER JOIN description ON patient.description_id = description.id WHERE patient.id = #{id};
